DialogueOption.Text: Hey, Galena. Got any questions about the universe for me?
I found a Nomai computer that predicts where meteors land on Brittle Hollow, but..
Hey, Galena. Got any questions about the universe for me?
I found a Nomai computer that predicts where meteors land on Brittle Hollow, but..
Hey, Galena. Got any questions about the universe for me?
I found a Nomai computer that predicts where meteors land on Brittle Hollow, but..

Dialogue.Page: <size=20>How much of Brittle Hollow left after the meteor storm ends..?</size>

DialogueOption.Text: What do you mean by meteor storm?
It depends on whether the Quantum Moon is orbiting Brittle Hollow.

Dialogue.Page: <size=20>Um, the meteor storms from Brittle Hollow's volcanic moon...</size>
<size=20>Riebeck told me this latest meteor storm hasn't stopped for weeks...</size>
<size=20>It might break apart Brittle Hollow really soon.. That's why they got their guts together to explore the Nomai city there, even though they were always scared of space...</size>
<size=20>It made me so sad... Thinking about one of the planets just disappearing forever...</size>
<size=20>Brittle Hollow looks so cool, I wanna go there if I become an astronaut one day.. But I don't think there's gonna be anything left of it soon...</size>

DialogueOption.Text: Maybe I'll go ask Riebeck what they know, then.

Dialogue.Page: <size=20>Just be careful where you land your ship if you go to Brittle Hollow, okay..?</size>
<size=20>The Quantum Moon is the weird moon that orbits around every planet in the star system, right..? I guess it makes sense for it to cause weird things to happen...</size>
<size=20>So... If the Quantum Moon stays away, the meteors won't be so random and unpredictable...</size>
<size=20>Once I become an astronaut, I just need to find some way to know where the Quantum Moon always is then...</size>

DialogueOption.Text: Hey, Galena. Got any questions about the universe for me?
I found a Nomai computer that predicts where meteors land on Brittle Hollow, but..
